```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

Create pairs plot
```{r}
#GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x=clarity, y=price)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
